channel.title: [317] Heaven-Reborn || Pking || Working Skills + Minigames
channel.description:
[CENTER][img]http://i.imgur.com/b7q353g.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/YxmKgLS.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/yTDkAVU.png[/img][/CENTER] [CENTER][SIZE=3][FONT=Arial Black][U]Links[/U][/FONT][/SIZE][/CENTER] [CENTER]Forums [url=http://heaven-reborn.com/forums/]Heaven-Reborn Forums[/url] Download Client [url=http://uppit.com/z1kmnhbrgetf/Heaven-Reborn.jar [/url] Heaven-Reborn is a new server that hopes to satisfy players to their needs and we don't offer fancy new features but what we try to achieve is a community that everyone can fit in. We strive to bring players what they want.
[B]Features[/B] Working Minigames Great Pking 24/7 VPS Ddos Protected Custom Information Tab A variety of teleports All working skills Completionist Cape Wilderness Monsters/Bosses 100% Duel Arena Dicing Hard economy Hard skilling (Completionist wont be easy.) Many potential PK areas Few customs to lighten up the server Many shops Teleport to Slayer task Many skill related money making methods Reliable Staff members Drop rates are reasonable Custom Players tab Many monsters throughout server to kill PKP system Awesome shops Weekly updates Dedicated server and more! Media[/CENTER] [CENTER] https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Sy0axjsD6Fs&feature=gp-n-o&google_comment_id=z122vl4wnyyah5kpr04cj3hbckrgwfjxfbg https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XPgXOVaaPbI [img]http://i.imgur.com/oQEsgrj.png[/img] [url=http://imgur.com/QJlpwDE,oQEsgrj,b7q353g,MplglK8#0]http://imgur.com/QJlpwDE,oQEsgrj,b7q353g,MplglK8#0[/url] [url=http://imgur.com/vjlFtcs,vDsWW84#0]http://imgur.com/vjlFtcs,vDsWW84#0[/url] [img]http://i.imgur.com/vDsWW84.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/l0w1qVU.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/cR3jliQ.png[/img][img]http://i.imgur.com/9muJvKW.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/h7tYdr4.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/x1zMd4B.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/TqVf5xy.png[/img][/CENTER] Also sorry for the crappy cropping skills.

Heaven-Reborn is a new server that hopes to satisfy players to their needs and
we donâ€™t offer fancy new features but what we try to achieve is a community that everyone can fit in.
We strive to bring players what they want.

[B]Features[/B]
Working Minigames
Great Pking
24/7 VPS Ddos Protected
Custom Information Tab
A variety of teleports
All working skills
Completionist Cape
Wilderness Monsters/Bosses
100% Duel Arena
Dicing
Hard economy
Hard skilling (Completionist wont be easy.)
Many potential PK areas
Few customs to lighten up the server
Many shops
Teleport to Slayer task
Many skill related money making methods
Reliable Staff members
Drop rates are reasonable
Custom Players tab
Many monsters throughout server to kill
PKP system
Awesome shops
Weekly updates
Dedicated server
and more!
